text: Azad Rahman Shakil (Popularly known as Master Shakil) is a Bangladeshi film actor. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist twice for the film Dumurer Phul (1978) and Danpithe Chele (1980). ==Selected films== * Dumurer Phul - 1978 * Din Jai Kotha Thakey - 1979 * Danpithe Chele - (1980) * Lagam - 1981 * Kalmilata - 1981 * Devdas - 1982 * Puroshkar - 1983 * Ekhono Onek Raat - 1997 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Azad Rahman Shakil
